description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Stop those pesky chipmunks playing with your Christmas tree. Using the coloured buttons and shoulder triggers on your controller, zap as many chipmunks as you can to increase your score and get to the next level.
description.short: Stop those pesky chipmunks playing with your Christmas tree. Using the coloured buttons and shoulder triggers on your controller, zap as many chipmunks as you can to increase your score and get to the next level.
